mapper.select: SELECT * FROM trip WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND (status = 0 or status = 2)
SELECT t.*, e.emp_name FROM trip t JOIN employee e ON t.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE t.status = 0 ORDER BY usedDate ASC
SELECT e.emp_Name,d.dept_name, t.* FROM trip t JOIN employee e ON t.emp_no = e.emp_no join DEPARTMENT d on e.dept_no= d.dept_no WHERE t.trip_no = #{tripNo}

SELECT e.EMP_Name, j.JOB_NAME, d.DEPT_NAME FROM trip_person tp JOIN trip t ON tp.TRIP_NO = t.TRIP_NO JOIN employee e ON tp.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO JOIN job j ON e.JOB_NO = j.JOB_NO JOIN department d ON e.DEPT_NO = d.DEPT_NO WHERE t.TRIP_NO = #{tripNo}
